page.title: 12DOCTORS SURGERY
page.content: There is room used next to the village hall by a doctor from Puckeridge Health Centre for an hour on Monday and Wednesday morning, but there are no facilities to examine you. Prescriptions have to be taken and collected from Puckeridge or Bishop's Stortford. Sometimes when you are in Puckeridge the Chemist will ask you to deliver medicine to someone in the village. The school doctor visits school each term and sees every one at least twice between the ages of five and eleven.The nurse visits the school regularly and there are hearing, sight and dental checks.
